name: Lengal's Adventure in the Poop Baldi Zone
name_original: Lengal's Adventure in the Poop Baldi Zone
description:
Lengal's Adventure in the Poop Baldi Zone pasta sauce LENGAL'S ADVENTURE - A stupid RPG i made with my friend group with references no one else can possibly understand. 

Play as Lengal as he journeys through a broken world to find and eliminate Baldevil, the man who became crazed with dark power and ruined everything. Make friends, enemies, but mostly enemies as you journey through the Poop Zone. (No poop included)

REPORT  BUGS AND FEEDBACK TO MY DIScORD Tsuchi#5885

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move, Enter to interact (hold to skip text), Escape to cancel, Shift to run.

CREDITS:

Me (Tsuchi (The creator)) - Most art, enemy designs, music, and scripting; all map design, story/writing, direction, ideas.

Renfrence - Some music, art and character designs

Something - Logo, Lengal overworld sprites

Erikso/Misoo - Battle portraits, some music

Mettallic - Appears in the game as a main character, betatester

iKzord - Appears in the game, devout betatester (THANK YOU)

Chippy - Final boss theme

DerVVulfman, LiTTleDRAgo, Juan, ThallionDarkshine - Scripts that i "borrowed" ( i have permissionplease)

Mystman12 - Created Baldi (who is the main antagonist)

The Dave & Bambi Crew - Inspired this whole ordeal

Foxel - My biggest fan


LASTLY

I worked pretty hard on this game. I'm really happy with how it came out even if it is dumb as shit and totally confusing to everyone but me and my friends. I hope people enjoy it as much as i do, lol.
